00026 #include "lpc17xx_timer.h"

00038 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00039 uint8_t menu1[] =
00040 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00041 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00042 "Timer measure frequency demo \n\r"
00043 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00044 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00045 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 -  115200 bps \n\r"
00046 " Use timer 0 to measure input signal frequency through its CAP0.0 \n\r"
00047 " Use timer 2 to generate different frequency signals \n\r"
00048 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00049 
00050 TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TIM_ConfigStruct;
00051 TIM_CAPTURECFG_Type TIM_CaptureConfigStruct;
00052 
00053 BOOL_8 first_capture,done;
00054 uint32_t capture;
00055 uint8_t count=0;
00056 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00057 /* Interrupt service routines */
00058 void TIMER0_IRQHandler(void);
00059 
00060 void print_menu(void);
00061 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00062 /*********************************************************************/
00067 void TIMER0_IRQHandler(void)
00068 {
00069         if (TIM_GetIntCaptureStatus(LPC_TIM0,0))
00070         {
00071                 TIM_ClearIntCapturePending(LPC_TIM0,0);
00072                 if(first_capture==TRUE)
00073                 {
00074                         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,DISABLE);
00075                         TIM_ResetCounter(LPC_TIM0);
00076                         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00077                         count++;
00078                         if(count==5)first_capture=FALSE; //stable
00079                 }
00080                 else
00081                 {
00082                         count=0; //reset count for next use
00083                         done=TRUE;
00084                         capture = TIM_GetCaptureValue(LPC_TIM0,0);
00085                 }
00086         }
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00090 /*********************************************************************/
00095 void print_menu(void)
00096 {
00097         _DBG(menu1);
00098 }

00101 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00102 /*********************************************************************/
00107 int c_entry(void)
00108 {
00109         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00110         TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TIM_MatchConfigStruct;
00111         uint8_t idx;
00112         uint16_t tem;
00113         uint32_t freq,temcap;
00114         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00115          * – 115200bps
00116          * – 8 data bit
00117          * – No parity
00118          * – 1 stop bit
00119          * – No flow control
00120          */
00121         debug_frmwrk_init();
00122 
00123         // print welcome screen
00124         print_menu();
00125 
00126 
00127         //Config P1.26 as CAP0.0
00128         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00129         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00130         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00131         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00132         PinCfg.Pinnum = 26;
00133         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00134         // Configure P0.6 as MAT2.0
00135         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00136         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00137         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00138         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00139         PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00140         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00141 
00142         while(1)
00143         {
00144                 // Initialize timer 0, prescale count time of 1uS
00145                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00146                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 1;
00147 
00148                 // use channel 0, CAPn.0
00149                 TIM_CaptureConfigStruct.CaptureChannel = 0;
00150                 // Enable capture on CAPn.0 rising edge
00151                 TIM_CaptureConfigStruct.RisingEdge = ENABLE;
00152                 // Enable capture on CAPn.0 falling edge
00153                 TIM_CaptureConfigStruct.FallingEdge = DISABLE;
00154                 // Generate capture interrupt
00155                 TIM_CaptureConfigStruct.IntOnCaption = ENABLE;
00156 
00157                 // Set configuration for Tim_config and Tim_MatchConfig
00158                 TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00159                 TIM_ConfigCapture(LPC_TIM0, &TIM_CaptureConfigStruct);
00160                 TIM_ResetCounter(LPC_TIM0);
00162                 idx=0;freq=0;tem=0;
00163                 while(idx<3)
00164                 {
00165                         if(idx==0)
00166                         _DBG("\n\rPlease input frequency (from 1 to 999 hz):");
00167                         tem = _DG;
00168                         switch(tem)
00169                         {
00170                         case '0':case'1':case '2':case '3':case '4':case '5':case '6':case '7':case'8':case '9':
00171                                 tem = tem - 0x30;
00172                                 idx++;
00173                                 if(idx==1) tem = tem * 100;
00174                                 else if (idx==2) tem = tem * 10;
00175                                 freq = freq + tem;
00176                                 if(idx==3)_DBD16(freq);
00177                                 tem = 0;
00178                                 break;
00179                         default:
00180                                 _DBG("...Please input digits from 0 to 9 only!");
00181                                 idx = 0; tem = 0; freq = 0;
00182                                 break;
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00186                 TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 1;//1us
00187                 TIM_Init(LPC_TIM2, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00188 
00189                 // use channel 0, MR0
00190                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchChannel = 0;
00191                 // Disable interrupt when MR0 matches the value in TC register
00192                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.IntOnMatch   = FALSE;
00193                 //Enable reset on MR0: TIMER will reset if MR0 matches it
00194                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ResetOnMatch = TRUE;
00195                 //Stop on MR0 if MR0 matches it
00196                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.StopOnMatch  = FALSE;
00197                 //Toggle MR0.0 pin if MR0 matches it
00198                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ExtMatchOutputType =TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE;
00199                 // Set Match value
00200                 TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 500000/freq;
00201                 TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM2,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00202 
00203                 TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM2,ENABLE);
00205                 /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00206                 NVIC_SetPriority(TIMER0_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00207                 /* Enable interrupt for timer 0 */
00208                 NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00209 
00210                 first_capture = TRUE;done=FALSE;capture=0;
00211                 // To start timer 0
00212                 TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00213 
00214                 _DBG("\n\rMeasuring......");
00215                 while(done==FALSE);
00216                 temcap = 1000000 / capture;_DBD16(temcap);_DBG("hz");
00217                 NVIC_DisableIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00218                 TIM_DeInit(LPC_TIM0);
00219                 TIM_DeInit(LPC_TIM2);
00220                 _DBG("\n\rPress c to continue measuring other signals...");
00221                 while(_DG != 'c');
00222         }
00223 }
00224 
00225 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00226 int main (void)
00227 {
00228         return c_entry();
00229 }
